wikipedia_page.main: Thomas Robertson (28 December 1864 – January 1924) was a Scottish footballer, who played for Cowlairs, Aston Villa, Queen's Park, St Bernard's and Scotland. After retiring as a player, Robertson was a football referee and became president of the Scottish Football League.

response: * 28 December – Thomas Robertson (d. 1924), Scotland international in four matches (1889–1892).
